One day, while Laura is at work, Mike discovers the stash and takes half of the candies. Later, Jenny also finds the stash and takes half of the remaining candies. When Laura comes home and checks her stash, how much candy does she have left? Who does she suspect took her candy?

One day, while Laura is at work, Mike discovers the stash and takes half of the candies. Then, Jenny also finds the stash and takes half of the remaining candies. When Laura comes home, she checks her stash and wants to know how much candy is left.

Then, Jenny comes along and takes half of the remaining candies. So, Jenny takes (X/2)/2 = X/4 candies. Now, the amount left after Jenny takes her share would be X/2 - X/4 = X/4 candies.

So, when Laura comes home, she finds that only X/4 of her original candy stash is left.

Now, the question is, who does she suspect took her candy?
